name.baseName: cement production;cement, alternative constituents 6-20%, 52.5MPa;new suspension preheater;mixed solid wastes
水泥生产;水泥, 替代成分 6-20%, 52.5MPa;新型悬浮预热器;混合固废

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Common cement where the 3rd day compressive strength is greater than 21 MPa and the 28th day compressive strength is 52.5 MPa. Industrial solid waste that contains silica and flue gas desulfurized (FGD) gypsum is used in cement manufacture instead of clay and gypsum. The main stream of cement production – new suspension preheater (NSP) – is applied in the Chinese cement industry. There are three primary production processes: The pulverized coal and raw material preparation process, including the transfer, grinding, homogenization, and storage of raw materials, and the grinding and storage of coal. In the incineration process, the ground and mixed raw materials are inputted into the preheater and then the calciner and decomposed with 60% coal at 950 ◦C. The limestone decomposes to about 95% in the calciner and 5% in the kiln. The decomposed materials fall into the kiln and are incinerated to clinker with 40% coal at a temperature of over 1400 ◦C. In the finishing process, the cement is produced when the clinker, mineral additions, and gypsum are granulated finely by a grinding mill. The raw materials are suspended and heated by recycled hot air in the preheater.

普通水泥的第三天抗压强度大于21 MPa，第28天抗压强度为52.5 MPa。新型悬浮预热器（New suspension preheater，NSP）是中国水泥工业中主要的水泥生产工艺。该工艺包括三个主要的生产过程：煤粉和生料制备过程，包括原材料的输送、研磨、均化和存储以及煤的研磨和存储；在燃烧过程中，混合磨碎的生料被输入到预热器中，然后经过煅烧器分解，60％的煤在950℃下燃烧。在煅烧器中，石灰石分解率约为95％，在窑中分解率为5％。分解后的物料落入窑中，在超过1400℃的温度下与40％的煤燃烧成熟料。在成品处理过程中，当熟料、矿物添加剂和石膏在磨煤机中细细粉碎时，水泥就被生产出来了。生料在预热器中通过再生的热空气悬浮并加热。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The main stream of cement production – new suspension preheater (NSP) – is applied in the Chinese cement industry. There are three primary production processes: The pulverized coal and raw material preparation process, including the transfer, grinding, homogenization, and storage of raw materials, and the grinding and storage of coal. In the incineration process, the ground and mixed raw materials are inputted into the preheater and then the calciner and decomposed with 60% coal at 950 ◦C. The limestone decomposes to about 95% in the calciner and 5% in the kiln. The decomposed materials fall into the kiln and are incinerated to clinker with 40% coal at a temperature of over 1400 ◦C. In the finishing process, the cement is produced when the clinker, mineral additions, and gypsum are granulated finely by a grinding mill. The raw materials are suspended and heated by recycled hot air in the preheater (Hasanbeigi et al., 2010).

The main stream of cement production – new suspension preheater (NSP) – is applied in the Chinese cement industry. There are three primary production processes: The pulverized coal and raw material preparation process, including the transfer, grinding, homogenization, and storage of raw materials, and the grinding and storage of coal. In the incineration process, the ground and mixed raw materials are inputted into the preheater and then the calciner and decomposed with 60% coal at 950 ◦C. The limestone decomposes to about 95% in the calciner and 5% in the kiln. The decomposed materials fall into the kiln and are incinerated to clinker with 40% coal at a temperature of over 1400 ◦C. In the finishing process, the cement is produced when the clinker, mineral additions, and gypsum are granulated finely by a grinding mill. The raw materials are suspended and heated by recycled hot air in the preheater (Hasanbeigi et al., 2010).
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents cement production using new suspension preheater (NSP) technology with a mix of alternative constituents at 6-20%. The described cement has a strength grade of 52.5 MPa, suitable for construction applications where high early strength is not the primary requirement, but long-term durability and high final strength are essential. The utilization of mixed solid waste as a substitute for traditional raw materials in cement formulation demonstrates an eco-friendly approach. This information is pivotal for industries involved in large-scale infrastructural development, where bulk amounts of cement are utilized for concrete structures and construction projects.
此数据集代表使用新型悬浮预热器（NSP）技术的水泥生产，其混合替代成分比例为6-20％。所描述的水泥具有52.5 MPa的强度等级，适用于建筑应用，其中早期强度不是主要要求，但长期耐用性和高最终强度至关重要。使用混合固体废物代替传统原材料的水泥配方展现了环保方法。这些信息对于参与大规模基础设施开发的行业至关重要，其中大量水泥用于混凝土结构和建筑项目。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: One ton of cement with 52.5 MPa strength grade is used as functional unit (FU).System boundaries involve raw material and energy production, road transport, raw material crushing, clinker production, cement milling and packaging, waste heat energy recovery, direct emissions, on-site flue gas treatment and solid waste reuse in cement plants.
使用52.5 MPa强度等级的1吨水泥作为功能单位（FU）。系统边界涉及原材料和能源生产、道路运输、原材料破碎、熟料生产、水泥磨和包装、废热能回收、直接排放、现场烟气处理和水泥厂中固体废物再利用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Annual average data on the operational processes of cement production (e.g. raw material and energy consumption, transportation distance, energy recovery, direct emissions, waste disposal, capital costs) were obtained from a survey of China United Cement Company.
水泥生产的操作过程（如原材料和能源消耗、运输距离、能量回收、直接排放、废弃物处理、资本成本）的年度平均数据是从中国联合水泥公司的调查中获得的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Dong Yang, Lin Fan, Feng Shi, Qian Liu, & Yajing Wang. (2017). Comparative study of cement manufacturing with different strength grades using the coupled LCA and partial LCC methods-A case study in China. RESOURCES CONSERVATION AND RECYCLING, 119, 60–68.

Dong Yang, Lin Fan, Feng Shi, Qian Liu, & Yajing Wang. (2017). Comparative study of cement manufacturing with different strength grades using the coupled LCA and partial LCC methods-A case study in China. RESOURCES CONSERVATION AND RECYCLING, 119, 60–68.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: China United Cement Co., Ltd. accounts for 9.45% of China's cement market.According to data from the "2014 China Cement Yearbook", the number of 5000t/d and 2500t/d cement production lines using new suspension preheater technology accounted for 56.1% and 28.3% of all cement production lines in China respectively. Production lines with a scale of 5000t/d and 2500t/d may have relative accuracy, reflecting the main characteristics of China's cement production.Parameter: value;Cement production line scale: 5000t/d×1, 2500t/d×2;Cement production technology: new suspended preheater;Power generation recovery efficiency: 30%;Dust removal technology: dry bag dust removal;Dust removal efficiency: 99.95%;Denitrification technology: selective non-catalytic reduction method;Denitrification efficiency: 50.00%.

中国联合水泥有限公司，占中国水泥市场的9.45%。根据《2014年中国水泥年鉴》的数据，采用新型悬浮预热器技术的5000t/d和2500t/d水泥生产线数量分别占中国所有水泥生产线的56.1%和28.3%。规模为5000t/d和2500t/d的生产线可能具有相对准确性，反映了中国水泥生产的主要特点。参数：数值；水泥生产线规模：5000t/d×1，2500t/d×2；水泥生产技术：新型悬浮预热器；发电回收效率：30%；除尘技术：干法袋式除尘；除尘效率：99.95%；脱硝技术：选择性非催化还原法；脱硝效率：50.00%。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should note that this LCA dataset specifically considers NSP technology used in the Chinese cement industry, reflective of the average operational processes and efficiency levels reported by the China United Cement Company. When applying this data, users should ensure that their application's geographical context matches or closely aligns with these Chinese industry conditions. Considerations should include the reported power generation recovery, dust removal, and denitrification efficiencies which may not be ubiquitous in all cement production technologies globally. The reuse of solid waste for raw material and the exclusion of its manufacturing process should be noted and considered when compared with traditional cement production datasets.

用户应注意，这个生命周期评价（LCA）数据集特别考虑了中国水泥产业中使用的新型悬浮预热器(NSP)技术，反映了中国联合水泥公司报告的平均操作过程和效率水平。在应用这些数据时，用户应确保他们应用的地理背景与这些中国产业条件匹配或密切对齐。应考虑报告的发电回收效率、除尘和脱硝效率，这些可能在全球所有水泥生产技术中并不普遍。固体废物用于原料的再使用以及忽略其制造过程应在与传统水泥生产数据集比较时注意并考虑。

completeness.common:other: The manufacturing of raw materials except limestone is ignored because almost all of these materials are industrial solid waste.
除了石灰石外，原材料的制造被忽略，因为几乎所有这些材料都是工业固体废物。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Electricity. The LCI data for electricity and coal were collected from the literature.
电。从文献中收集了电力和煤的LCI数据。
Coal. The LCI data for electricity and coal were collected from the literature.
煤炭。从文献中收集了电力和煤的LCI数据。

Road transport. According to the survey, the transport distance of raw materials in the cement production is about 200 km. The environmental impacts of road transportation were taken from the literature.
公路运输。根据调查，原材料在水泥生产中的运输距离约为200公里。道路运输的环境影响取自文献。
Particulates. The particle size is not specified. Here we treat it as PM>10.
颗粒，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
